audit_brief.revenue_note: Not provided - owners reinvest all profits, only taking 2 car payments
products_services: Soil, pots, and plant care supplies
audit_brief.ideal_customer_profile: Yuma residents interested in houseplants, especially those who value unique/rare specimens and support local businesses
audit_brief.sales_model: Brick-and-mortar retail with occasional plant classes

tech_stack.website: Basic landing page, not functional for e-commerce

audit_brief.current_ai_usage: ChatGPT for creating marketing flyers and content (~15 min per piece)

business_goals.note: Owner stated: 'If I could get my ad in front of everyone in Yuma, I could turn this into a legitimate career'
Need someone with plant knowledge AND customer service skills
Has 5,000-6,000 sq ft basement available for expansion

budget_constraints.note: Business is bootstrapped, reinvesting all profits. Recent $250 Instagram ad campaign was a test.

audit_brief.discovery_source: Discovery call via Chris Andrade (childhood friend of Toby)

current_state_maps.trigger: Potential customer becomes aware of shop

steps.description: Potential customer in Yuma (doesn't know shop exists)
steps.pain_point: Primary bottleneck - most Yuma residents unaware of shop

steps.description: Customer either discovers shop (walk-in, social media) or never discovers
steps.pain_point: No systematic outreach, relies on organic discovery

steps.description: Customer enters shop, is amazed by experience
steps.note: Every new customer says 'I didn't know this building existed' and 'Holy shit, this place is awesome'

steps.description: Customer browses, may purchase, may leave without contact captured

pain_points.description: Customers don't know shop exists despite being in revitalized downtown area
pain_points.frequency: Daily - owner hears this every single day
pain_points.source: Client quote: 'Every single day I hear I didn't know this building existed'

pain_points.description: No systematic marketing or outreach program
pain_points.source: Client confirmed no email marketing, no scheduling tools, ad-hoc posting

pain_points.description: Instagram growth stalled without paid campaigns
pain_points.source: Client grew from 2200 to 2600 followers with $250 ad spend over 3 weeks

metrics.viral_post_result: Sold more taxidermy frames in 2 weeks than prior 3 months

current_state_maps.frequency: Daily for sales, periodic for shipments (~350 plants per import)

steps.description: Receive shipment of plants (typically 350 per import order)
Manually enter inventory into Square by species and size (4", 6", 8")
steps.pain_point: Frequently forgotten, leading to inventory drift

steps.description: Process sales through Square
Discover discrepancies (e.g., 'negative 6 on hand but I see 5 on shelf')
Spend time correcting inventory records
steps.pain_point: Time wasted on corrections instead of revenue-generating activities

pain_points.description: Inventory entry frequently forgotten when orders arrive
pain_points.source: Client stated: 'plenty of times you'll go in there and it says negative six of these on hand, but I see five of them out'

metrics.note: Owner valued their time at $75/hr during call

steps.description: Source plants from US suppliers or international (has APHIS import license)
Optimize order mix to reduce shipping cost per plant (target: ~$2/plant)
steps.note: Mix of 25 rare + 325 small plants = 350 total per order

steps.description: Receive shipment in basement 10x10 grow tent
Daily monitoring during 2-month acclimation period
steps.pain_point: Most vulnerable state for plants, requires daily attention

steps.description: Move acclimated plants to retail floor

pain_points.description: Manual watering and monitoring is time-consuming
pain_points.source: Client described manual process with wire racks and nursery flats

pain_points.description: Cannot delegate without training - plants die if overwatered
pain_points.source: Client: 'if they sit there and overwater my plants back to back, they're all going to die'

automation_cost_estimate.note: Client estimate: $1,500 hardware for DIY, <$5,000 turnkey

steps.description: Open store (lights, displays, plants check)
steps.pain_point: No documented checklist, relies on memory

steps.description: Handle customer service and sales
Water plants as needed
steps.pain_point: Critical task - easy to over/under water without training

steps.description: Create and post marketing content
steps.pain_point: Ad-hoc, no schedule, not consistently done

steps.description: Close store

pain_points.description: No SOPs or checklists for daily operations
pain_points.source: Client acknowledged need for SOPs, mentioned firefighting-style procedures

pain_points.description: Cannot delegate marketing tasks without playbook
pain_points.source: Discussed need for employee to take photos and post content
Owner doing DIY marketing when time permits

steps.description: Develop curriculum (one-time per class type)
Promote on social media
Host 2-hour class at venue
Upsell plants and supplies to attendees

pain_points.source: Classes held ad-hoc rather than systematically

metrics.free_plant_experiment: Tested without free giveaway - still sold out, only 1 of 27 asked about it

ai_opportunity_matrix.name: Marketing Playbook + Automated Content System
ai_opportunity_matrix.description: Create systematic marketing playbook with AI-assisted content generation. Employee takes 2-3 photos daily, uploads to designated folder, AI generates Instagram/Facebook posts on schedule.
ai_opportunity_matrix.impact_justification: Primary bottleneck is customer awareness. $250 ad spend proved Instagram works. Systematic approach will compound.
ai_opportunity_matrix.effort_justification: Playbook documentation + simple automation. Owner already uses ChatGPT for content.

ai_opportunity_matrix.name: Google Reviews Automation System
ai_opportunity_matrix.description: Automated review collection with QR code at POS. Customer scans, leaves review, enters monthly plant raffle. System tracks entries and selects winner.
ai_opportunity_matrix.impact_justification: Owner's manual campaign generated 20+ reviews in 2 weeks (24→44). Automation makes this continuous.
ai_opportunity_matrix.effort_justification: QR code + simple form + tracking spreadsheet or tool
ai_opportunity_matrix.roi: TBD - qualitatively: continuous social proof building

ai_opportunity_matrix.name: Daily Operations SOPs + Digital Checklists
ai_opportunity_matrix.description: Create comprehensive SOPs for open/close, watering, inventory entry, marketing tasks. Laminated checklists plus optional digital tracking for accountability.
ai_opportunity_matrix.impact_justification: Enables delegation to new employee. Owner explicitly mentioned wanting 'firefighting-style' SOPs.
ai_opportunity_matrix.effort_justification: ChatGPT can draft, owner reviews, print and laminate
ai_opportunity_matrix.roi: TBD - enables $20/hr employee vs $75/hr owner time

ai_opportunity_matrix.name: Inventory Entry Reminder System
ai_opportunity_matrix.description: Simple reminder system triggered when shipments arrive. Could be as simple as checklist step or automated notification when supplier emails arrive.
ai_opportunity_matrix.impact_justification: Saves 10 hours/month in corrections (~$750 at owner rate)
ai_opportunity_matrix.effort_justification: Part of SOP or simple email trigger

estimated_monthly_value.note: Based on 10 hrs/month × $75/hr owner valuation from call

ai_opportunity_matrix.roi: Payback in first month if implemented

ai_opportunity_matrix.name: Grow Tent Automation System
ai_opportunity_matrix.description: Drip irrigation with timers, recycling reservoir, optional moisture sensors. Reduces daily monitoring to 1 hour and enables delegation with checklist.
ai_opportunity_matrix.impact_justification: Enables production scaling and delegation. Owner stated target is 1 hr/day maintenance.
ai_opportunity_matrix.effort_justification: Hardware installation, some DIY work. Owner estimated 1-2 days setup.

risks.mitigation: Daily check included in SOP, backup manual watering
Start with basic timer/drip, add sensors later

ai_opportunity_matrix.roi: TBD - enables production scaling and delegation
ai_opportunity_matrix.priority_calculation: Impact(high=3) × 2 + Feasibility(medium=2) = 8, adjusted to 7 due to hardware dependency

ai_opportunity_matrix.name: Employee Onboarding Package
ai_opportunity_matrix.description: Comprehensive onboarding kit for incoming volunteer (niece's boyfriend): training schedule, SOPs, plant care guides, accountability system, 90-day progression plan.
ai_opportunity_matrix.impact_justification: De-risks volunteer period, accelerates productivity. Volunteer already committed to 3 months free.
ai_opportunity_matrix.effort_justification: Builds on SOPs (OPP-003), adds training curriculum and progression milestones.
ai_opportunity_matrix.roi: TBD - enables 28+ hrs/week of freed owner time
ai_opportunity_matrix.priority_calculation: Impact(high=3) × 2 + Feasibility(medium=2) = 8, adjusted to 7 due to OPP-003 dependency

ai_opportunity_matrix.name: Class Scheduling and Promotion System
ai_opportunity_matrix.description: Create regular class schedule (e.g., monthly), automated promotion sequence, registration system, and post-class follow-up for reviews/referrals.
ai_opportunity_matrix.impact_justification: Classes already profitable ($810 from 27 people). Systematizing creates predictable revenue stream.
ai_opportunity_matrix.effort_justification: Curriculum exists, just needs scheduling and promotion sequence

risks.mitigation: Test with monthly frequency, adjust based on demand

ai_opportunity_matrix.name: Square Analytics Utilization
ai_opportunity_matrix.description: 1-hour walkthrough of Square analytics features (top sellers, categories, trends). Establish weekly review habit for data-driven decisions.
ai_opportunity_matrix.impact_justification: Data is already there, just underutilized. Quick knowledge transfer.
ai_opportunity_matrix.roi: Qualitative - better inventory and pricing decisions

ai_opportunity_matrix.name: Website E-commerce Integration
ai_opportunity_matrix.description: Integrate Square inventory with website for online rare plant sales. Target out-of-town buyers who recognize below-market pricing.
ai_opportunity_matrix.impact_justification: Opens new revenue channel. Visitors from Vegas note prices are 'cheap' compared to their market.
ai_opportunity_matrix.effort_justification: Website development, inventory sync, shipping logistics
ai_opportunity_matrix.priority_calculation: Impact(medium=2) × 2 + Feasibility(medium=2) = 6, adjusted to 5 due to dependencies

ai_opportunity_matrix.name: Basement Production Facility Expansion
ai_opportunity_matrix.description: Negotiate with landlord for full basement access (~5,000-6,000 sq ft). Install multiple grow tents for massive production scaling.
ai_opportunity_matrix.impact_justification: Owner: 'I'd be a production powerhouse down here'

risks.mitigation: Phase expansion, prove single tent first

ai_opportunity_matrix.roi: TBD - transformational but requires proof of concept first
ai_opportunity_matrix.priority_calculation: Impact(high=3) × 2 + Feasibility(low=1) = 7, adjusted to 4 due to capital and timing

target_state_designs.name: Marketing Playbook + Automated Content System
target_state_designs.solution_summary: A comprehensive marketing playbook that enables any employee to capture and publish consistent social media content. The system includes daily photo requirements, AI-assisted caption generation, and scheduled posting. This transforms marketing from ad-hoc owner activity to systematic delegated process.
systems_involved: Photo upload folder (Google Drive or similar)
Optional: Later.com or Buffer for scheduling

ai_components.name: Caption Generator
ai_components.purpose: Generate engaging captions from plant photos and brief descriptions
ai_components.technology: ChatGPT API or manual ChatGPT usage

steps: Morning: Take 2-3 photos of interesting plants/displays
Upload to designated folder with brief description

target_state_designs.data_flow: Employee photos → Shared folder → AI caption generation → Scheduled posting → Engagement tracking
governance: Owner approves posts initially, delegates after comfort

target_state_designs.name: Daily Operations SOP System
target_state_designs.solution_summary: Comprehensive Standard Operating Procedures covering all daily operations: opening, closing, plant watering, inventory entry, customer service, and marketing tasks. Delivered as laminated checklists for in-store use plus digital backup. Enables confident delegation to new employee.
systems_involved: Google Docs or Notion for digital versions
Optional: Simple checklist app for accountability

ai_components.name: SOP Generator
ai_components.purpose: Draft initial SOP documents from owner walkthrough

target_state_designs.data_flow: SOP documents → Laminated checklists → Daily completion → Weekly owner review

target_state_designs.name: Google Reviews Automation System
target_state_designs.solution_summary: Automated review collection system using QR code at point of sale. Customers scan, leave Google review, and automatically enter monthly plant raffle. System tracks entries and simplifies winner selection.
target_state_designs.data_flow: QR scan → Review prompt → Entry form → Tracking sheet → Monthly drawing
governance: Winner announced publicly for social proof

target_state_designs.name: Grow Tent Automation System
target_state_designs.solution_summary: Automated irrigation system for 10x10 grow tent reducing daily maintenance from undefined hours to approximately 1 hour. Includes drip irrigation with timers, recycling reservoir, and simple monitoring. Enables delegation to trained employee with checklist.

steps: Walk through tent checking plant health

target_state_designs.data_flow: Timer schedule → Automated watering → Employee daily check → Owner weekly review
governance: Owner trains employee on plant health indicators

target_state_designs.name: Employee Onboarding Package
target_state_designs.solution_summary: Comprehensive 90-day onboarding program for new employee (niece's boyfriend volunteering initially). Includes training schedule, plant care curriculum, accountability system, and clear progression milestones from volunteer to paid employee.

ai_components.name: Training Content Generator
ai_components.purpose: Create plant care training materials from owner knowledge

target_state_designs.data_flow: Training modules → Daily checklists → Weekly reviews → Progress milestones → Paid position decision
governance: Clear criteria for paid position transition

phases.name: Foundation - Quick Wins
phases.phase_value_note: Enables delegation, systematic marketing, and ~$750/month savings on inventory corrections

phases.name: Scale Enablement
phases.focus: Enable employee, automate production, systematize revenue streams
phases.phase_value_note: Frees owner time via employee, enables production scaling, adds predictable class revenue ($360-810/class)

phases.name: Revenue Expansion
phases.focus: New revenue channels and growth preparation
phases.phase_value_note: Opens new market (out-of-town buyers who recognize below-market pricing)

future_phases.name: Basement Production Expansion
future_phases.trigger: Single tent automation proven successful, business plan approved by landlord
future_phases.note: Transformational opportunity - 5,000-6,000 sq ft production facility

future_phases.name: Import/Export Business Development
future_phases.trigger: Thailand/Vietnam trip in April, direct supplier relationships established
future_phases.note: Owner has APHIS import license, interested in long-term export opportunity

executive_summary.current_state: Maples Apothecary is a specialty plant and exotic goods shop in Oldtown Yuma with an excellent in-store experience but significant customer awareness challenges. Owner Toby operates the business with minimal staff, handling all operations personally.
key_findings: Primary bottleneck is customer awareness - 'every day I hear I didn't know this building existed'
Recent $250 Instagram ad test proved marketing works (400 new followers, viral post drove 3 months of frame sales in 2 weeks)
No SOPs or checklists prevent delegation, keeping owner tied to all operations
10 hours/month lost to inventory correction (~$750 at owner's $75/hr valuation)
Potential employee identified (volunteer for 3 months, plant-passionate, detail-oriented)
executive_summary.opportunity_summary: 10 opportunities identified across marketing, operations, and revenue. Top priorities: marketing playbook, operations SOPs, and review automation - all low-effort, high-impact.
executive_summary.projected_impact: TBD - requires baseline metrics. Qualitatively: enables delegation, systematic marketing presence, production scaling capability.
executive_summary.roi_summary: Cannot calculate - baseline metrics required for traffic, conversion, and time allocation

sections.title: Business Context
sections.content: Industry overview, company profile, stakeholders, business goals

sections.content: 5 process maps covering customer acquisition, inventory, plant operations, daily ops, and classes

sections.title: Pain Points & Opportunities
sections.content: 11 pain points identified, 10 opportunities scored and prioritized

sections.title: Target State Designs
sections.content: 5 detailed solution designs for top opportunities

sections.title: Implementation Roadmap
sections.content: 12-week phased approach: Foundation (2 weeks), Scale Enablement (4 weeks), Revenue Expansion (6 weeks)

sections.title: Next Steps
sections.content: Select engagement option, schedule kickoff, begin Phase 1

presentation_outline.title: The Challenge
talking_points: 'Every single day I hear I didn't know this building existed'
Excellent shop experience, awareness is the bottleneck

presentation_outline.title: What's Working
talking_points: Viral insect post: 3 months of frame sales in 2 weeks
Review raffle: 20+ new reviews in 2 weeks

presentation_outline.title: Phase 1 Detail
talking_points: Marketing playbook so employee can post
Result: Delegation enabled, systematic marketing started

presentation_outline.title: Investment & Value
talking_points: Value: Freed owner time, systematic growth, production scaling

notes.author: Audit Agent
notes.note: Initial audit created from discovery call transcript. Toby's audio came through Chris's microphone - speaker identification based on context.

notes.author: Audit Agent
notes.note: Strong relationship context: Chris Andrade is Toby's childhood best friend since 5th/6th grade. High trust engagement.

notes.author: Audit Agent
notes.note: Potential employee identified: niece's boyfriend, described as 'autistic enough to be detail-oriented', passionate about horticulture, willing to volunteer 3 months.

unknowns: Monthly revenue (owners reinvest all, only take car payments)
Current time spent on various activities
Class conversion rate (attendees who become customers)

data_sources.note: Toby's audio came through Chris's microphone

assumptions_made.assumption: Owner values time at $75/hr for ROI calculations
Volunteer employee will be available as discussed

Get Square data export for sales analysis
